title: quizbase
alt: Gif of the code quiz application.
description: QuizBase is full-stack application for creating, storing, and sharing coding quizzes. Test your knowledge of coding languages and computer science by attempting others quizzes and see if you can top the high scores list.

title: Math.random
description: Heads or tails? This application uses JavaScript math functions to simulate random events like rolling dice or flipping a coin.

title: MVC Burgers
description: MVC Burgers is a SQL database of delicious burgers. You can make and devour virtual burgers with this Node.js application that is deployed to Heroku.

title: Weather GraphQL
description: A React weather application that calls the OpenWeather API using GraphQL and displays a current and five-day forecast for a searched city.

title: Velocity
description: Velocity is a full-stack application that helps users accomplish goals through planning tasks and tracking meals. This application uses Sequelize to create a SQL database of users, tasks, and meals.

title: Decider Diner
description: Not sure what to eat for dinner? Decider Diner gives meal or restaurant suggestions based on user responses. This mobile-friendly application calls the Spoonacular and Zomato APIs.

title: Day Planner
alt: Gif of the day planner application.
description: This daily planner saves hourly events to localStorage. It features a day and night mode, which dynamically updates the css styling with the click of a button.

title: Savvy
alt: Gif of the Savvy Budget application.
description: Savvy Budget is a NoSQL application built to inform users on personal finance principles.
